data.meta_description: Name of University is Seirei Christopher University (College of Nursing). Choose Study Program, Compare Tuition And Fees and Apply Online to Seirei Christopher University (College of Nursing). Chats online with university admissions officers on official pages of universities.
data.text:
About the university

~ €6,570 / year

Wide range of departments Specialized university A popular university

One day in October 1930, a needy young man who suffered from tuberculosis came to visit Christians in Hamamatsu to ask for help. Young Christians built him a wooden hut and gave him a good nursing care. the history of Seirei group started from this humble hut. Since its inception, the Seirei Gakuen Educational Organization has been promoting the Bible’s philosophy of “Dignity of Life” and “Love thy Neighbor” which it continues to use in its educational practices today. Seirei Christopher University plays a starring role in education and research in the Seirei Group. Their first activity was started by young Christians back in May 1930 when they helped a homeless tubercular patient using their belief of “Love thy Neighbor” from the Christian Philosophy. SCU cultivates professionals in the fields of healthcare and social work with the spirit of human dignity and neighborly love.

How to apply to the university

Choose a program

Press “Apply now” button

Send an application form

Complete admissions tasks

Go to study

To apply to Seirei Christopher University (College of Nursing) follow these steps. To get more information about the university and the admissions process, you can use the live chat to contact a university representative.

Required documents for admission

When applying for admission to Seirei Christopher University (College of Nursing) in Japan you should prepare all required documents. Request a list of necessary documents directly from a university, as it may vary for different countries. Using our live chat, you can also ask for sample documents.

TOEFL Certificate

Health and Life Insurance

Research proposal outline (MA, PhD)

Medical Certificate

IELTS Certificate

Application fee

Online Application form

Passport

Proof of fee payment

Declaration for financial support

Wide range of departments Specialized university A popular university

Free Apply is not responsible for the content of this page. Through the Site, Free Apply provides an online catalog which you can use to find different types of educational institutions. It’s possible for a new university to be registered by any user, however only verified university representatives will be able to manage, reply in chat and make changes to a university page. Once the University registers its official representative, it has the right to block access for others to edit the information. Further control over the content will be carried out by the representative of the University. Registration with the Free-Apply.com catalog is free.
